New Records: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander recorded a career-high 45 points in a game earlier this season.
Pre-Game Insights: The Memphis Grizzlies are 22-10 and first in the Southwest Division, with Ja Morant doubtful due to a shoulder injury.
The Oklahoma City Thunder are 24-5 and lead the Northwest Division, with Shai Gilgeous-Alexander averaging 31.1 points and 6.1 assists per game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is the Thunder's second consecutive back-to-back after playing on the road.
Memphis has covered the number in 7 of its last 9 games, while Oklahoma City is 8-2 ATS in its last 10.
Others: The game is available on the NBA app and various TV networks.
Betting odds for the game are OKC -7.5 and O/U 228.
